item.title: Scala up and running
item.description: Installation Java Installed AdoptOpenJDK 8. Other failed in runtime for https issues (apparently, missing the local store that is installed with Java) Scala Installed SBT from official site. New project Create project root folder. In the root folder, create build.sbt file. Create [root]/src/main/scala/arch/Application.scala file, for a package named arch Content for build.sbt for a project with a subproject ThisBuild / version := "0.1.0" ThisBuild / scalaVersion := "2.12.13" ThisBuild / organization := "com.
